chara.textHome: There you are! I've been waiting!
Let's have tons of fun today, 'kay?
There's so much I want to do at the beach!
Good morning! Did you sleep well?
I couldn't sleep, I was too excited...

Too busy thinking about what fun things
to do, or what flavor shaved ice to get...

You've got to get yakisoba if you're
having lunch at a beach house!
I wonder why?

I guess it tastes better since
it's a special occasion.

I love getting home from school
and eating ice cream in the AC.
It just makes me the happiest!

We're going to set off fireworks tonight!
Sayaka got lots ready, all different kinds.
Which one should I light up first?
Here, have a sports drink.

You have to keep an eye on your water
and salt intake to beat the heat.
You can't have fun if you get yourself sick!
Ah! I sense a Witch!

I'm gonna take it out right now so
it won't bother all these people
enjoying their summer!
This summer heat has me seeing mirages...
No, wait, they're just our reflections, right?
Still, we need to keep focused!

I brought a swim float along 'cause
I'm not too confident about swimming.
It feels nice floating in it though.
Everyone should try it!

Agh, I'm losing my balance!
Is the watermelon this way?
I'm gonna trip...eek! So cooold!
Hee hee, I found the ocean instead.
Look, look at this teeny little crab I found!
...Ah! It hid! Hmm?
Oh, this little shrimp is so cute too!
I love playing in the sand!
I put peach syrup on my shaved ice!

Trading bites with everyone is half the fun,
right?
Here, open wide and say aaah...
Hee hee, that was a little embarrassing, huh?

What do you think of my swimsuit?
I thought it might stand out a bit too much...
But my mom said it's better that way.
Hee hee...

Homura looks so cute in her swimsuit,
doesn't she?!

The flowers she pinned in her hair are cute,
but the ribbons trailing from her back
are the cutest!
Kyoko's swimsuit looks great too.
I hope I can wear one like hers next year...
But would it suit me?

It'd be nice if we could all go looking for
swimsuits together next year.

It'd definitely be fun to pick one out
while discussing which ones fit and
how cute they are!
H-hot! It's sooo hot!
The beach is scorching!
I left my sandals back at the beach house...

Ugh, I guess I'll brave the sand
and go back to get them.
